name: Remove Sticky Headers
description: Removes sticky/fixed navigation bars that follow you while scrolling, giving you more screen space

rules.css: header[style*='position: fixed'], header[style*='position:fixed'], nav[style*='position: fixed'], nav[style*='position:fixed'], .header, .navbar, .nav-bar, .navigation, .site-header, .main-header, .top-bar, .sticky-header, [class*='sticky-nav'], [class*='fixed-nav'], [class*='fixed-header'], [id*='sticky-nav'], [id*='fixed-nav'], [id*='fixed-header'] { position: static !important; top: auto !important; }
